name: Shoalroot
description:
This game was made for Team Dog Pit's Cultivation gamejam June 10th to June 26th, 2022, as a solo project.

Play as a merperson and farm underwater featuring water animals and plants! 

This game is more inspired by Harvest Moon games such as Harvest Moon DS and Harvest Moon GB. 

Features:

- Plants that function more like those in other farming games
- A small crafting system
- A mine to go ore and gem hunting in
- Townsfolk you can marry (invite as roommates essentially)

There are a few hidden interactive places that will provide you with items.

Additional links:
https://ko-fi.com/kiuttie
https://kiuttie.tumblr.com/
